author: Neil Strawson and Richard Hunt
programme: I Can Cook on the Go
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Grease six holes of a muffin tray with vegetable oil. Beat the egg and ricotta together in a bowl until smooth. Stir in the leek and bacon. Divide the mixture between the muffin holes and bake in the oven for 30 minutes or until just cooked through.
